result.subject: Password Expiration Reminder

Hi ${user.name},

Your password for ${mail_script:password_expiration_process_name_script} expires in ${mail_script:password_expiration_remaining_days_script} day(s).

${mail_script:password_expiration_email_reminder_script}

Thank You
result.name: Password Expiration Email & SMS Reminder
result.sms_alternate: Your password for ${pwd_process.name} will expire on ${pwd_expiration_date}. To avoid login issues, change or reset your password before it expires.

result.subject: Your request for a password reset was not processed
result.message_html:
Hello ${user.name},

You requested a password reset for your ${process.label} user account.

Your password reset request was not processed because of any of these reasons:

  • You aren’t enrolled.
  • You aren’t a part of the configured password reset process.
  • Your account is blocked because either the account exceeded the limit on reset attempts or you have  reset your password recently.
  • Your account is locked.

If you want immediate help, contact the service desk.

 

Thank you,

Customer Support
result.name: Password Reset Identify Notification
result.sms_alternate: A password reset was requested for your user account. You can't use the configured password reset process. Try again or call the service desk.
